Date: Thursday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Progress of Tomas Derosa
Dear Sir,
Tomas Derosa is doing pretty good at A Longmont Storm!
He has an ERA of 2.31, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Wondering
Boss,
What about my playing time? Am I not
good enough to play regularly for this
team? I'm not a happy camper right now. If that doesn't
change, trade me!

Regards,
Clinton Lane



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Status of Bennett Estrada
Dear Sir,
Bennett Estrada shouldn't play at AA St. Paul Saint!
He has an AVG of .243 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
